Producer: Bill Bennett, Jennifer Cluff, Martin Fabinyi
Production Co: MBP & Co. KG, Trimark Pictures, Mushroom Pictures, Beyond Films
Synopsis: The cast and crew of the horror flick "Hot Blooded" are learning what it means to be stalked by a masked killer. When the director is viciously murdered on set, the production is shut down and the film locked away, incomplete. But every time the footage is screened, somebody dies.
Title: Cut
